name: VNRecognizeTextRequest
desc: An image analysis request that finds and recognizes text in an image.

items.name: var minimumTextHeight: Float
items.desc: The minimum height, relative to the image height, of the text to recognize.

items.name: var recognitionLevel: VNRequestTextRecognitionLevel
items.desc: A value that determines whether the request prioritizes accuracy or speed in text recognition.

items.name: enum VNRequestTextRecognitionLevel
items.desc: Constants that identify the performance and accuracy of the text recognition.

items.name: var results: [VNRecognizedTextObservation]?
items.desc: The results of the text recognition request.

items.name: var recognitionLanguages: [String]
items.desc: An array of languages to detect, in priority order.

items.name: var usesLanguageCorrection: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request applies language correction during the recognition process.

items.name: var customWords: [String]
items.desc: An array of strings to supplement the recognized languages at the word-recognition stage.

items.name: func supportedRecognitionLanguages() -> [String]
items.desc: Returns the identifiers of the languages that the request supports.

items.name: let VNRecognizeTextRequestRevision2: Int
items.desc: Revision 2 of the text recognition algorithm.

items.name: let VNRecognizeTextRequestRevision1: Int
items.desc: Revision 1 of the text recognition algorithm.
